title: What the actual f*ck did just happen to my post?
body:
So, 2 days ago I posted a thread where I was explaining why autofill needs to be removed(or remade).
It had 19 upvotes and 1 downvote just 8 hours ago and then it got 45 downvotes out of nowhere.
https://prnt.sc/qyah2w
this was clearly some moderator that didnÂ´t like what I said in the post and then he just created a lot of fake accounts in order to bring my thread to the bottom of Boards. This is a coward act. Boards is clearly rigged.
